items.name: Retro Pool
items.description: (for community members who may help during the event)

items.name: Addressing community requests
items.description: We have carefully taken into account the feedback and incorporated changes accordingly.

items.name: Working within time constraints
items.description: We have evaluated what is feasible within the given timeframe and made adjustments.

items.name: Lower the Metaverse Activation
items.description: After considering community feedback, we have decided to lower the Metaverse Activation from the proposal.

items.name: Scaling down the lounge to a booth
items.description: In response to community feedback on the sponsorship price, we have transformed the lounge into a booth. Additionally, we have adjusted the sponsorship package to align with the revised offering.

items.name: Collaboration with Aubtoshi for merchandise
items.description: Instead of producing our own merchandise, we have decided to collaborate with Aubtoshis and feature their pre-made merchandise.

description:
Nouns leads the NFT movement in Brazil thanks to its community, but we are just getting started. We are proposing a huge Sao Paulo city takeover starting in NFT.Brasil event. Our goal is to achieve a massive and innovative onboarding experience for all attendees, and to do so, we will be present in five strategic areas throughout the event journey. These include the NFT Exhibition, Speaker Sessions, Booth, Metaverse, and Street Gallery (Eletromedia OOH advertising). NFT.Brasil is a pioneering conference celebrating the cutting-edge advancements and possibilities of the NFT world that is set to take place in Sao Paulo city, Brazil on June 2nd, 3rd, and 4th, 2023.

NFT.Brasil is performed by the same organizers of NFT.Rio, Nouns Community builders (the same people behind Proposals #142, #118 #98) in partnership with MAAC Hub.
title: NFT.Brasil Sao Paulo City Takeover
